mema sammelanaya thawaduratath meseda pa්rakasha karayi: demala eelam rajyaya, uthuru saha nagenahira palathwala jiwath wana demala janathawagen samanwitha wana athara, ema demala eelam rajyaye purawasi bhawaya pilibanda purna saha sama ayithin, ese illa sitina lankawe oonama pa්radeshayaka jiwath wana demala katha karana sama janathawakatamath, lokaye oonama thanaka jiwath wana demala eelam sambhawaya sahitha oonama demala jathikayekutath laba dena bawada, demala eelamaye kisi kotasak wisin kisi aagamika pa්rajawak ho bhaumika pa්rajawak yatapath nokaranu labima sahathika karanu was, demala eelamaye wyawasthawa pa්rajathantha්riya wimadhyagathakarana muladharmaya matha padanam wana bawada, demala eelamaya thula kula bhedaya ahosi kerena athara, uthpaththiya matha thindu kerena oonama kon kirimak ho asamanathwayak thuran kerena bawada, ewannak nithiyen danduwam labena waradak bawata pathkarana bawada, mehi wesena siyalu janathawage aagamwalata aarakshawa saha sahayogaya sapayena laukika rajyayak bawata demala eelamaya pathkerena bawada, demala eelamaye rajya bhashawa demala wana namuth, ehi wesena sinhala katha karana sulutharayanta adhyapanaya saha wenath katayuthu karagena yama sandaha owunge bhashawata athi ayithiya, sinhala rajyaye wesena demala janathawata owunge bhashawen katayuthu kirimata laba dena awasarayata samanupathikawa aaraksha kerena bawada, demala eelamaya samajawadi rajyayak wana bawada, minisa wisin minisa surakama thahanam kerena bawath, sha්ramaye abhimanaya piliganna bawath, nishpadana marga saha bedaharima rajya ayithiyata saha palanayata yatath kerena bawath, nithiye sandahan simawan thula paudgalika wyaparawalata ida labena bawath, aarthika sanwardhanaya samajawadi salasum matha padanam wana bawath, oonama pudgalayekuta ho pawulakata himikam kiwa haki mulu dhanaye simawak panawena bawath, pa්rakasha kara siti.

‘entaprayis shri lanka’ mema sahana naya laba dimedi merata kriyathmaka pasal bas ratha ha wan ratha himiyan naga situwima sadahada wishesha awadhanayak yomu kara athi athara ee anuwa ema kshethraya naga situwima sadaha ‘riya shakthi’ namin sahana poli naya yojana kramayakda hadunwa dimata piyawara ganuni.samastha lanka pasal lamun prawahana sangamaya wisin karana lada likhitha illimak anuwa mema ‘riya shakthi’ sahana poli naya yojana kramaya hadunwa dimata rajaya thiranaya kara athi athara eya boho denekuge agaya kirimatath, pasasumatath lakwa atha.
wishwaye athi sama wasthuwakma eeta anukula suwishshi chalanathmaka sankhyatha pa්rawegayak sahithawa ka්riyathmaka weyi.

ිshri lankawa dakunu aasiyawe weleda ha nawuka kshethraye kendrasthanayak lesa wardhanaya kirime kriyawaliye di guyan waraya wani abhyanthara warayan ha sambandha wime hakiyawa saha awashyathawa pilibandawa da shri lankiya niyojitha pirisa mehidi awadhanaya yomu kalaha.aapada kalamanakarana amathya anura priyadarshana yapa, maha nagara saha basnahira sanwardhana amathya patali champika ranawaka, agramathya lekam saman eekanayaka, agramathya jyeshta upadeshaka charitha rathwaththe, agramathya athireka lekam saman athawudahetti, chinaye shri lanka thanapathi aacharya karunasena kodithuwakku, basnahira mahanagara salasum wyapruthiye sabhapathi ajith da kostha, sanwardhana eejansiye kalamanakarana adhyaksha mangala yapa, dakunu sanwardhana mandalaye sabhapathi shirantha herath, sanwardhana upaya marga saha jathyanthara welanda amathyanshaye upadeshaka rayan rokwud, shri lankawe china thanapathi yi shiyan liyan yana mahathwarun da me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha.
